name: e2-demo-package
description: Basic API test automation framework for NASA APOD
author: Mate Radnai

scripts.test: npm run clean && mocha test/**/*.tests.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,json=false --timeout 12000
scripts.test:parallel: npm run clean && mocha test/**/*.tests.js --parallel --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=report,json=false --timeout 12000
